title: Person of Interest: John Reese vs The Fixer's Cafe
author: Joseph Bennet
comment: The look that Reese gives Fusco at 0:51-0:53 is perfect - perfect and funny.
What some people don't realize in this scene is that John went in the first time to check how equipped and what weapons the people in the bar had. Getting thrown out was part of the plan lol.

Jim Caviezel is an adorable man.
I wonder if he didn't play John Reese, who would ?
This is a badass clip, love it, talk about you brush yourself off and start all over again. You don't thou John off to the curb, and think he will run off like a hurt puppy, do you?     Chirp
